33136c29-54c4-407f-ae8b-16817866bf86.race_name: Forbes Diggers Harness Racing Club Final

race_form.race_comment: SAINT JULIEN (4) was ultra-impressive when he scored by 15 metres at this track last start over 2060m. Should continue with the good form. The one they have to beat. MACH DADDY (5) was a dominant 30 metres winner at this track over 2060m last start. Racing well and rates highly - sure to prove very hard to beat. RING THE TILL (11) has been about the mark of late and is a great chance to find winning form. Good effort last time out when he finished second at this track over 2060m. TULHURST TERROR (9) must be considered after he finished runner-up over 2060m at this track a week ago.
race_form.race_comment_alternative: SAINT JULIEN (4) was ultra-impressive when he scored by 15 metres at this track last start over 2060m. Should continue with the good form. The one they have to beat. MACH DADDY (5) was a dominant 30 metres winner at this track over 2060m last start. Racing well and rates highly - sure to prove very hard to beat. RING THE TILL (11) has been about the mark of late and is a great chance to find winning form. Good effort last time out when he finished second at this track over 2060m. TULHURST TERROR (9) must be considered after he finished runner-up over 2060m at this track a week ago.

race_form.race_comment: DUALIST (6) is a handy galloper who resumed with a good second over 1400m at Chukyo Dirt after being on the speed throughout. Fitter and looks a great chance to add to his three wins from just five starts. FULL VOTE (10) ran on well for a 0.8 lengths victory at this circuit and journey as favourite last time out, making it two-for-two this prep. Should be parked just off the speed and will be tough to beat again. GEMPACHI FORZA (3) scored a big win last start over 1200m at Nakayama Dirt to make it two wins from four starts. Has the speed to be prominent in the run and looks one of the main contenders. LUCE D'ORO (7) ran on well when resuming at big odds last time over 1400m at Chukyo Dirt, finishing fourth and beaten just 1.1 lengths. Beaten narrowly at G3 level as a juvenile so he has the talent to test these.
race_form.race_comment_alternative: DUALIST (6) is a handy galloper who resumed with a good second over 1400m at Chukyo Dirt after being on the speed throughout. Fitter and looks a great chance to add to his three wins from just five starts. Beaten narrowly at G3 level as a juvenile so he has the talent to test these.

race_form.race_comment: WANDO BEL (2) was a good winner here last time out over Desert Spirit and he draws perfectly here. Heâ€™ll get a gun run and take beating. ATOMIC WIZARD (3) draws out but was game behind Lancaster Sound last time and her overall record here is very good. DESERT SPIRIT (4) will be right in the thick of things from the inside gate and is a speedy type who has a good record this track and trip. KEV'S GIRL (6) was a soft Terang winner last tie out and should get a gun run from the draw in a race with plenty of speed. ROHLON DRUNK (1) was down the track at Gawler behind Extra Mile last time and his previous effort behind Thrill Kill was very good and is a three time winner here.

race_form.race_comment: TIGER TRAP (4) is quick and ready to win off two near-misses. Finds easier grade and can manage the wide gate. RADIO ROOM (1) seeks the hat-trick off the nice 66 win when first-up in a strong form contest. He can go on with it now using the rails barrier. FLOREAT PICA (9) is a former Victorian back after 37 days for the Cole yard. He wins this at best and just has to take to the surface. DATASET (7) disappointed the latest but won and jut missed the two before and is capable of bouncing.

DATASET (7) disappointed the latest but won and jut missed the two before and is capable of bouncing.

b59c9ba7-1149-4fb3-aa61-e4024a7499b7.race_name: Tab Long May We Play Ht3

race_form.race_comment: ANGEL GLOW (4) was beaten into fourth last time but ran impressive time with a useful 29.57 at this track over 515m. Has the ability and expected to go close. HEAD ON BONNIE (1) goes very well this trip starting eight times for three wins and two minors. Placed last time (29.95) at this track in a Grade 5, finishing second and beaten 4.5 lengths. Looks suited here and can measure up. PLAN AHEAD (8) comes off a moderate effort latest finishing sixth at Geelong over 520m behind El Cazador (30.73) in a Grade 4/5. Was in winning form prior to that. Form from last run has since proven very strong. Better than last start and can bounce back. SLICK INTENTION (5) comes into calculations after placing most recently.
race_form.race_comment_alternative: ANGEL GLOW (4) was beaten into fourth last time but ran impressive time with a useful 29.57 at this track over 515m. Has the ability and expected to go close. SLICK INTENTION (5) comes into calculations after placing most recently.

race_form.race_comment: ALMIGHTY STRIPE (7) found trouble and failed to finish over 400m at this track last time when strongly fancied. Has good speed and will be prominent from out wide. Key player on best form and expected to bounce back. SILENT JACKO (2) boasts a strong record this course with 12 wins and 13 minors from 35 tries. Missed the frame latest (30.23) when sixth over 512m at this track in a OPEN. Among the main chances. JERVOIS BRUIT (4) is in hot form after clocking a speedy 22.40 victory two back then followed up with a 23.01 win at Gawler over 400m last time. Flying lately and shapes as a definite danger again. NUMINOUS (1) racing over this distance brings the best out in him.

NUMINOUS (1) racing over this distance brings the best out in him.

race_form.race_comment: GRAND POPE (3) is close to breaking through again after a narrow loss last time at Pakenham. Looks ideally placed in this grade and should go close. DOMINUS (1) was a Ballarat winner three starts back before not being disgraced in town at past couple. Rates strongly here and is well worth another chance. THE SISCOS KID (6) followed up a Stawell victory with a promising display at Wangaratta last time. Expected to measure up here. SURIN BEACH (9) just missed as favourite at Echuca last time and back on home track here should make a bold bid.

DOMINUS (1) was a Ballarat winner three starts back before not being disgraced in town at past couple. Rates strongly here and is well worth another chance. THE SISCOS KID (6) followed up a Stawell victory with a promising display at Wangaratta last time. Expected to measure up here. SURIN BEACH (9) just missed as favourite at Echuca last time and back on home track here should make a bold bid.

race_form.race_comment: TRIUMPH KING (11) showed good speed and was prominent throughout before holding a placing, beaten 7 lengths over 1400m here last time. Has the addition of blinkers this time and will strip much fitter. Sure to go close. SISEON GANGTAL (5) is usually thereabouts but finds it hard to win, with one from 12 starts but has been placed five times. Yet to win at the distance but has recorded two minor placings from three tries and is sure to run well. SUNLIGHT BOY (2) finished fifth last start over 1400m at this track, beaten 5.5 lengths. Rates well and looks a definite each way chance. BEAUTIFUL GALLOP (7) finished fourth last start over 1400m at this track, beaten 10 lengths. Has the ability to give this a shake.

race_form.race_comment: EMERIZ (4) was a dominant maiden winner last time out and can take plenty of confidence from that victory. Hutchings has been in the irons for all three career starts to date and sticks.  Drawn to get a great run from gate three and will in it a long way. STONE COLD (1) is a winner of seven races and is one from one over this track and trip. Gets 2kg off with the claim and looks a major threat. BLAZING BEAU (6) is another who gets the benefit of a 2kg claim and will be at peak fitness for this fourth-up from the spell. ON ANGELS WINGS (3) has been plying his trade in provincial company and will appreciate the drop in grade here first run for the new stable. Must be included. MOON OVER MENAH (7) loves this track with two wins and a second from just four starts and can be in the frame.
